wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Beverley Joicey  (born 11 May 1970) is the Director General for Finance at Department for Work and Pensions, having previously been Director General for Strategy, International and Finance at Defra. He previously worked as private secretary and speech writer to United Kingdom chancellor Gordon Brown, as a journalist at The Observer newspaper and as director of the International Department at HM Treasury.
